TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {218751=Cyient is in the Computers - Software sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 6,043.90 crore. The company management includes B V R Mohan Reddy - Executive Chairman, Krishna Bodanapu - Managing Director & CEO, M M Murugappan - Independent Director, K Ramachandran - Independent Director, Harsh Manglik - Independent Director, Som Mittal - Independent Director, Andrea Bierce - Independent Director, John Paterson - Independent Director, Alain De Taeye - Non Executive Director, Thomas Prete - Non Executive Director, Shankar Narayanan - Non Executive Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532175 and the NSE with an NSE Code of CYIENT. Its Registered office is at 4th Floor, A Wing, Plot No. 11,,Software Units Layout, Infocity, Hyderabad,Telangana - 500081.
